#summary Draft: Vision and requirements.

= Introduction =

The air war is simulated at the tactical level. The units involved are of squadron and wing size.

The ground war is simulated at the operational level. The units involved are of battalion and division size.


= Details =

== Requirments ==
 * Player level
The experience of the player is reflected by his position within the squadron. 
   * Section leader
   * Flight leader
   * Squadron leader
 * Squadron management
The player can become the CO of a squadron and can then influence the mission parameters. 
   * Select aircraft and loadouts
   * Assign pilot
   * Modify waypoints
 * Rank system
 * Medals and Decoration system
 * Single-player and cooperative multiplayer support
